name: 6-9 Month Hayfield
description:
Hand knit bonnet made from fine merino wool, so soft to the touch. This stylish bonnet brings fun texture to your image!

*This bonnet is meant to be used as a photography prop and must be used under supervision at all times*

Photos courtesy of Nicole Smith Photography

name: Aster Bonnet - 16 combos
description:
Hand knit bonnet made from fine baby llama, so soft to the touch. This stylish bonnet brings fun texture and color to your image!

Choose between soft grey and cream for your base and add some pop with your  favorite color-block color! 

*This bonnet is meant to be used as a photography prop and must be used under supervision at all times*

Photo courtesy of Kristy Kay Photography

name: Express Shipping
description: Receive a tracking number for your  order and ensure that you receive it within 3-5 business days of the shipped date!
